org.simplity.kernel.dt

Class BlobDataType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.kernel.dt.DataType
      • org.simplity.kernel.dt.ClobDataType
        • org.simplity.kernel.dt.BlobDataType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class BlobDataType
extends ClobDataType
    Blob is a pseudo data type, because we actually do not allow this data type to be used for data element. However, the RDBMS has this data type for storage, and we need to store/retrieve this. BlobDataType is a wrapper on textDataType to facilitate this. Actual Blob data is saved (before saving, or after retrieving) in a temp-file. Field that is associated with BlobDataType has a value of text that is the key to this file.
    Author:
    simplity.org
